name: Starting the Game (itch) (Online Vision)
description:
Starting the Game is a game about a non-experienced gamer who is trying to download, crack and play a game.

List of features:
  • Fully narrated by a native English speaker
  • Steam achievements
  • Gaming/tech/IT memes
  • Simulation of various OS's
  • Terrible design

Can you survive being a computer noob and will you actually get to play a game?
Let's see...

If you donate, you will also receive a Steam key for the game.
